ygData.subject: Re: Reed's Bard Song Analysis Spreadsheet V 1.13
ygData.msgSnippet: Ack!  Thanks Olgwinn; I can t believe I missed those (doh).  This will be fixed in the next version :)  Give me a tell sometime I ll buy you a drink in game ;)
ygData.messageBody:
Ack! Thanks Olgwinn; I can't believe I missed those (doh). This
will be fixed in the next version :) Give me a tell sometime I'll
buy you a drink in game ;)

- Reed Stormwind (54 bard of E'ci) <forlorn>


> Just wanted to mention a couple things... I just dinged 53
tonight, and I
> can say with a certainty, the level 53 song, Song of Twilight,
definitely
> does not require an instrument.

> Also, are you sure that the 54 song Villa's Verses of Celerity and
55
> Cantata of Replenishment are targetted and not group songs? I
thought they
> changed Jonathan's Provocation because they didn't like giving
bards
> targetted (ie. not self and not group) buffs.

>Anyway, great work on the spreadsheet...

> Olgwinn Pendragun
> Bard of 53 Songs
> Crimson Legacy, E'ci
